snippet.title: Memory/Flag Capture - VC4000
snippet.description: Memory is a simple and addictive game for all ages. This cartridge also have a Capture the Flag game mode. In this mode you search for the flag, and get hints about mines and the overall direction. Sort of a mix of labyrinth and minesweeper. Both one and two player modes. Blogpost: http://retro-spill.blogspot.com/2014/03/memorycapture-flag-8-vc-4000.html
